Text.Language: Twbh m~Po#c# e~h~r/i e~jwn: peniwt e#y#u# abba Abraam: pie~pickopoc n~te Viom: n~tef,a nennobi nan e~bol.
Pray to the Lord on our behalf, our holy father Abba Abraam, the Bishop of Fayoum, that He may forgive us our sins.
